scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:cart" "npm run start:home" "npm run start:pdp" "npm run start:server"
scripts.start:client: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:cart" "npm run start:home" "npm run start:pdp"
scripts.install: concurrently --kill-others "npm run install:cart" "npm run install:home" "npm run install:pdp" "npm run install:server"
scripts.first_deploy: npm install -g pnpm && pnpm i concurrently -D
